title: Blog App
description: The Fullstack Blog Application lets users create, read, update, and delete blog posts with secure JWT-based authentication. Built with React, Node.js, Express, and MySQL, it features a responsive interface, efficient CRUD operations, and RESTful APIs for seamless blog and user management. This project showcases secure, scalable, and reliable frontend-backend integration.

title: Astronomy of the Day
description: A React project that fetches NASA's APOD data via the NASA API, featuring the ability to view the image NASA posted on your birthday.

title: Mini Expenses Tracke (DB Hosting shutdown)
description: A full-stack development and deployment project using MySQL, Express, React, and Node.js with CRUD functionalities. The frontend is hosted on Netlify, the backend on Render, and the database on Aiven using AWS services, all utilizing free-tier hosting solutions.

title: Old Portfolio
description: My first React portfolio, built using HTML, CSS, and React to showcase my projects and skills.

title: Scidama Online
description: Scidama is an online version of a traditional Scidama Filipino board game. Developed using Node.js, JavaScript and Socket.io for real-time PVP gameplay, allowing players to compete online.
